Instance.description: Define the information associated with a particular buck that is used as a currency.

TunableEnum.name: buck_type
TunableEnum.description: The buck type for this currency.

Tunable.name: flyaway_gain_audio
Tunable.description: Audio to use for the flyaway for this currency if currency is gained.

Tunable.name: flyaway_loss_audio
Tunable.description: Audio to use for the flyaway for this currency if currency is lost.

Tunable.name: gain_string
Tunable.description: A string like '++{0.Money}' that will be used in UI to display an increase in this currency.

Tunable.name: lose_string
Tunable.description: A string like '--{0.Money}' that will be used in UI to display a decrease in this currency.

Tunable.name: value_string
Tunable.description: A string like '{0.Money}' that will be used in UI to display a value of this currency.
